SHOPPING GUIDANCE

About the Store

Website: https://nogenki.com

Payment

Payment Methods

Credit Card
We accept Visa, MasterCard, JCB, American Express, Diners Club International, and Discover.
○ Notes on credit card payments:
・In some cases, we may not be able to offer this method depending on the credit card company's screening.
・If an error occurs with the card, we will stop shipment and contact you via email.
・For security reasons, we do not send a copy of the credit card receipt (invoice) by default.
・We use cardholder authentication (EMV 3-D Secure).
PayPay
PayPay is a cashless payment service operated by PayPay Corporation.
※Note: This method cannot be used for orders containing pre-order items.
PayPal
PayPal is a cashless payment service operated by PayPal Inc.
※Note: This method cannot be used for orders containing pre-order items.
Convenience Store Payment
Convenience store payment is a payment method through stores that accept payments for goods.
It allows payment at any time at convenience stores.
Bank Transfer
Bank transfer is a payment method where the customer pays directly into the business’s bank account after purchasing the product online.
Pay Later (Paidy)
Paidy is a payment method that allows you to pay next month after making an online purchase.
Paidy handles the payment collection, and the shop can ship the goods.
Rakuten Pay
An app that makes smartphone payments easy. You can choose from various payment methods.

※Overseas buyers should complete the checkout By PayPal or Credit Card.

Shipping

In-stock items will be shipped within 2-3 days.
While pre-order items will be shipped within 10-15 days.

※The shipping cost will include a base fee and a tiered fee based on the weight of the items you order. The shipping cost will increase as the weight increases. Please be aware of this.

※Depending on the destination country, delivery to the customer may take 8-15 days.

※Countries available for shipping: United States / Germany / France / Hong Kong / South Korea / Canada / Italy / Malaysia / Australia / Portugal / Sweden / United Arab Emirates / Denmark / Switzerland / Singapore / Spain / Poland / Finland / Netherlands / Ireland / Austria / Belgium / Czech Republic / Norway / New Zealand / Romania / Slovakia / Luxembourg / Greece / Hungary / Slovenia / Croatia / Estonia / Lithuania / Latvia / Cyprus / Malta

Other countries not mentioned may also be eligible for shipping. For details, please contact our customer service.

In general, deliveries to European countries are handled by Deutsche Post, the United States by USPS, and the United Kingdom by Royal Mail. For other countries, the delivery method will be arranged separately. For more details, please inquire with our customer service, and we will respond as soon as possible.

Notification Feature

When your order is completed, we will send an order confirmation email to the registered email address. If you do not receive an email, it may indicate that your order was not completed or that you have domain-specific email reception settings enabled.

Returns & Exchanges

In principle, we do not accept returns or exchanges for any overseas orders unless there is a quality-related issue. If the product has a quality problem, you will need to provide a video showing the issue after opening the package and inspecting the item. Once we receive the relevant video evidence, we will process the return or exchange. Except for this situation, we regret to inform you that we do not accept any other reasons for returns or exchanges. We appreciate your understanding. Please note.
